org.tikv.common

Interface ReadOnlyPDClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PDClient

    public interface ReadOnlyPDClient
    Readonly PD client including only reading related interface Supposed for TiDB-like use cases

      • updateServiceGCSafePoint

        Long updateServiceGCSafePoint(String serviceId,
                              long ttl,
                              long safePoint,
                              BackOffer backOffer)
        Update ServiceGCSafePoint
        Parameters:
        serviceId - ServiceId
        ttl - TTL in seconds
        safePoint - The TiTimestamp you want to set. Set to start_ts.getPrevious() is a good practice
        Returns:
        the MinSafePoint of all services. If this value is greater than safePoint, it means update failed
